\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage{qcircuit}

\begin{document}
\Qcircuit @C=1em @R=0.5em {
& \multigate{2}{\mathcal{A}} & \multigate{3}{\mathcal{R}} & \qw \\
& \ghost{\mathcal{A}} & \ghost{\mathcal{R}} & \qw \\
& \ghost{\mathcal{A}} & \ghost{\mathcal{R}} & \qw \\
& \qw & \ghost{\mathcal{R}} & \qw \\
}
\end{document}
